overview:
Leveraging Database Technology and Software for real world problems. Involved with projects and mission-critical work. Working with ISP’s and vendors to create better products and better services; SaaS and Cloud Computing Focus. Doing E-Commerce.

One of those people that tests and tests; It’s one thing for software to work; Another to work seemlessly. Not Average Service - Fast Service. Not only Fast Service - Great User-Experience.

Jordan Etem is very open to connecting with buyers, suppliers, and professionals to work on projects, and depending on the quality of the opportunity, Jordan Etem can contribute on cross-functional teams in a full-time environment for a Tech Company.
